summary:
I am a graduate of the Islamic International Dental College (IIDC) in Islamabad, and I am currently serving as a house officer at the Islamic International Dental Hospital (IIDH) with certification in endodontic and restorative dentistry. My professional journey includes a tenure as a dentist at Westridge Dental Clinic, preceded by a role as a dental intern at Link Road Dental Clinic. These experiences have provided me with a comprehensive understanding of dental procedures, clinical management practices, adherence to hygiene standards, and the importance of effective communication in patient care.

In addition to my clinical practice, I am actively involved as a liaison officer for APDSA-Pakistan. In this role, I facilitate collaboration among dental students in Pakistan and internationally, fostering a broader and more creative interaction within the dental community.

My passion for unconventional research in public health led me to conduct a cross-sectional study on the effect of pregnancy on oral pigmentation. This study involved investigating the oral cavity soft tissues of 1000 pregnant and non-pregnant females from various hospitals in Rawalpindi and Islamabad, Pakistan. Currently, I am engaged in a project focusing on the early childhood prediction of dental caries using a Machine Learning Model.

Outside of dentistry, I have a strong commitment to Social Work, with over 5 years of experience. I am certified in organizing and participating in various community service activities, including dental camps, plantation drives, oral hygiene awareness campaigns, workshops, and conferences for different international organizations.

I am eager to continue expanding my skills and knowledge, with the goal of applying innovative approaches to dentistry for the benefit of my community.

projects.description:
Develop original and engaging TSA questions, similar to UCAT, logic, reasoning, GMAT, and GRE and tutor them to people too. 
Ensure questions are accurate, clear, and aligned with the latest test standards and guidelines with provided answers and detailed solutions. 
Conduct thorough research to maintain a high level of expertise in the subject matter and stay updated on the latest trends and developments in the test prep industry. 
Collaborate with the team to review and refine questions, ensuring consistency, accuracy, and overall quality. 
Monitor user feedback and analytics to identify areas for improvement and incorporate insights into future question development.
projects.title: Upwork Project - Expert level questions maker & tutor - Logic/UCAT/Reasoning/SAT/GMAT/GRE

projects.description: The aim of this investigation to determine a difference, if any, between the patterns and intensity of oral pigmentation between women who have undergone pregnancies and those who have not in the absence of any systemic or local disease. It is a cross-sectional study for which we are investigating oral cavity soft tissues of pregnant and non-pregnant females in their reproductive years (18-45 years)
projects.title: Public Health Research - Effect Of Pregnancy on Oral Pigmentation

projects.description: This study aimed to develop and validate machine learning-based caries prognosis models for children aged 5–15 years, encompassing both primary and permanent teeth. Data were gathered from diverse urban and rural schools in Pakistan, utilizing the Caries Detection and Assessment System (ICDAS) criteria for dental caries assessment and Silness-Loe Plaque Index to determine Plaque accumulation. Various factors, including demographic, socioeconomic, behavioral, dietary, and clinical aspects, were considered predictors.
projects.title: Early Childhood Prediction Of Dental Caries Using Machine Learning Model

projects.description:
The Sparkly Smile Dental Camp aims to provide dental awareness and assessment for 70 children with special needs, including physically challenged, intellectually challenged, slow learners, hearing impairment, vision impairment, speech and language difficulties, developmental disorders, learning challenges, autism spectrum disorder, Down syndrome, and cerebral palsy children. The camp will focus on equipping volunteers with skills to address dental issues in special needs children, an area often not extensively covered in dental training. Free dental checkups for special needs children.
Discounts on dental treatments at Islamic International Dental Hospital, G-7/4 Islamabad.
projects.title: Sparkly Smile Dental Camp at Special School: Promoting Dental Health Among Special Needs Children in Islamabad

headline: Dentist | C-endodontic & restorative | Liaison Officer APDSA-PK | Board Member at The Youth Foundation (NGO) | Part-time Freelancer | Research Enthusiast

7th Pak Association for Dental Research and 8th Pakistan Prosthodontics Association Conference 2021
Volunteering in Dental Camp at Beheshte mustufa Orphanage, Islamabad.
Mind Control: Managing Your Mental Health During COVID-19

message.text:
We're thrilled to share that we've launched the CALL FOR MEDIA TEAM HEAD!
If you're passionate about joining us as the Media Team Head, check out the requirements outlined in the poster. 

The Deadline to apply is 24th May 2024, by 12am.

I am thrilled to announce that I have completed my Certification Course in Endodontic and Restorative Dentistry at SJ School of Dentistry and Esthetics. This was a 6-month long course that required 72 CME hours of my time. I am proud to mention that the course is American Council of Training and Development accredited and United Kingdom Accredited.

I am grateful for the enriching journey and excited to apply my newfound expertise in pushing boundaries and fostering innovation in the field.

#Cendo

My team and I organized a Dental Camp at the Nust Creative Learning School (NCLS), Islamabad from 2nd to 4th April 2024. We conducted oral screening for over 600 students, including measuring DMFTs and plaque index. We collected data on their dietary habits, use of Iron supplements, Flouride intake, and the amount of sugar intake in their daily routine. We also conducted dental checkups and awareness sessions for students from pre-school, primary and secondary school. At the end of the camp, we distributed Colgate Dental Kits to all students. The experience was enriching and rewarding for both the students and our team.

The camp will focus on equipping volunteers with skills to address dental issues in special needs children, an area often not extensively covered in dental training. Certificates will be provided to volunteers for their participation in this valuable activity.
ingestedContentSummary.title: Sparkly Smile Dental Camp

message.text: Visit the link for more details.

Our team had a productive experience with Shield at The City Grammar School Rawalpindi Branch. During the visit, we conducted dental examinations on children from KG to class 5, recording DMFTs and providing guidance on effective oral hygiene maintenance.

commentary.text: Dr.Usman Ul Haq PharmD RPH thank you
